subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Sports Injuries
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: A day after winning a World Cup downhill, Lindsey Vonn won a super-G in Austria and said she felt she had finally completed her comeback from a 2013 knee injury.
snippet: A day after winning a World Cup downhill, Lindsey Vonn won a super-G in Austria and said she felt she had finally completed her comeback from a 2013 knee injury.
